id: Anime Monogatari Series Heroine Book 7: Fire Sisters
Description:
Anime Monogatari Series Heroine Book #7: Fire Sisters (アニメ＜物語＞シリーズヒロイン本　其ノ漆　ファイヤーシスターズ, Anime Monogatari Shirīzu Hiroin Bon Sono Shichi Faiyā Shisutāzu) is the seventh heroine book. In this edition, the fire sisters: Karen and Tsukihi Araragi are featured. It was released on July 8, 2015 in Japan.
It contains the short stories Karen Brushing (かれんブラッシング) and Tsukihi Brushing (つきひブラッシング) along with exclusive illustrations, interviews, and more.
